Class Player

java.lang.Object
io.github.game.entities.Player
public class Player extends Object
Player class representing the player entity in the game. Handles movement, animation, tool interactions, and inventory management.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Player.PickupRequest
    Represents a pickup animation request for crops.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(int startX, int startY)
      Constructs a Player instance at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      startX - initial x-coordinate
      startY - initial y-coordinate

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the player's state each tick. Handles smooth movement, animations, and interaction timers.

    • move

      public void move(int dx, int dy, World world, Direction dir)
      Moves the player by the given delta if the target tile is walkable.
      Parameters:
      dx - change in x
      dy - change in y
      world - reference to the game world
      dir - direction of movement

    • stopMoving

      public void stopMoving()
      Stops player movement and sets the animation frame to idle.

    • interact

      public void interact(World world)
      Interacts with the current tile in the world using the selected tool.
      Parameters:
      world - reference to the game world

    • startHoeHold

      public void startHoeHold()
      Starts holding an interaction (used for tools like hoe).

    • stopHoeHold

      public void stopHoeHold()
      Stops holding an interaction and resets timers/animations.

    • isInteractReady

      public boolean isInteractReady()
      Checks if the player has held the interaction long enough.
      Returns:
      true if ready to perform interaction

      public int getSelectedToolIndex()

    • selectTool

      public void selectTool(int index)
      Selects a tool from the player's tool list. Stops hoeing animation if the tool changes.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the tool to select
